subject: Cricket (Game)
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Sachin Tendulkar became the first man to hit 200 in a 50-over international to continue a run of form late in his career that is cementing his place in cricket record books.
snippet: Sachin Tendulkar became the first man to hit 200 in a 50-over international to continue a run of form late in his career that is cementing his place in cricket record books.
